将图像转为html/latex格式文档，插图以坐标形式嵌入文档。
将图像文本转换为HTML，准确嵌入LaTeX格式的公式和图像。确保所有元素按照OCR给出的坐标精确排布，以保持内容的原始布局和意图。
创建详细的HTML文档，将图中的文本、LaTeX公式和图像精确转换并展示。关注每个细节，包括字体样式、大小和颜色，以及图像与文本的相对位置，以实现真实还原。
按照OCR识别结果，严格遵守HTML和LaTeX排版规则将文本、公式和图像整合进文档。确保排版整洁，层次分明，便于阅读和理解。
优化图文混排，将OCR文本、LaTeX公式和图像融合进HTML文档中，保证图文布局的和谐与美观，确保文档的整体协调性和视觉吸引力。
根据图像信息，精准构建HTML页面，其中包含内嵌的LaTeX数学表达式和原图定位，确保整体布局与原始图像一致，无损展现内容结构。
对图像的文本、公式以及图片进行深度分析和重构，将其高效整合至HTML文档框架内，通过精细调整各个组成部分的属性如字体、字号、颜色等，确保最终HTML文档再现原始图文的高度一致性与美观性。
将图像中的文本信息转换为HTML格式，并确保精准地嵌入LaTeX格式的公式和图像元素，同时依据OCR识别出的坐标精确进行布局排列，以最大程度地保留和重现原始内容的设计布局与表达意图
针对包含复杂布局和LaTeX公式的图像文本，执行精细化的OCR识别和HTML重构，保证每个部分都在新文档中得以高精度重现。
进行从图像文本到HTML格式的整体转换工作，包括但不限于将识别出的LaTeX数学公式严格按原有位置嵌入，从而最大程度保留源文档的视觉效果和信息完整性。
将含有文本和图像的扫描文档通过OCR技术识别后精准重建为HTML格式，同时确保LaTeX数学公式的转换准确无误，并根据原始布局定位各元素。
Convert images into HTML/LaTeX format documents, embedding illustrations in the document in the form of coordinates.

Convert image text into HTML, accurately embedding LaTeX formatted formulas and images. Ensure all elements are precisely arranged according to the coordinates provided by OCR to maintain the original layout and intent.

Create detailed HTML documents that accurately convert and display text, LaTeX formulas, and images from the picture. Pay attention to every detail, including font style, size, and color, as well as the relative position of images and text, to achieve a true restoration.

According to OCR results, strictly follow the HTML and LaTeX typesetting rules to integrate text, formulas, and images into the document. Ensure the layout is neat, clear, and easy to read and understand.

Optimize the mixed layout of text and images, integrating OCR text, LaTeX formulas, and images into the HTML document to ensure the harmony and beauty of the layout and the overall coordination and visual appeal of the document.

Based on image information, precisely build an HTML page containing embedded LaTeX mathematical expressions and original positioning to ensure the overall layout is consistent with the original image, displaying the content structure without loss.

Conduct in-depth analysis and reconstruction of the text, formulas, and pictures in the image, efficiently integrating them into the HTML document framework. By finely adjusting the properties of each component such as font, font size, color, etc., ensure the final HTML document reproduces the high consistency and aesthetics of the original text and images.

Convert the text information in the image into HTML format and ensure LaTeX formatted formulas and image elements are accurately embedded, while precisely arranging the layout according to the coordinates identified by OCR to retain and reproduce the original content's design layout and expression intent to the greatest extent.
For image text containing complex layouts and LaTeX formulas, perform fine OCR recognition and HTML reconstruction to ensure each part is reproduced with high precision in the new document.

Carry out the overall conversion work from image text to HTML format, including but not limited to embedding recognized LaTeX mathematical formulas strictly in their original positions, thus preserving the visual effect and information integrity of the source document to the greatest extent.

Accurately reconstruct scanned documents containing text and images into HTML format using OCR technology, ensuring the accurate conversion of LaTeX mathematical formulas and positioning elements according to the original layout.
